mapper.sql: id, electricity_model, electricity_name, electric_standards, voltage_test, active_energy, Installation_mode, community_mode, measure_mode, power_factor, power_waste, mem
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from nnlightctl_electricity_meter
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into nnlightctl_electricity_meter
id,
electricity_model,
electricity_name,
electric_standards,
voltage_test,
active_energy,
Installation_mode,
community_mode,
measure_mode,
power_factor,
power_waste,
mem,

mapper.update:
update nnlightctl_electricity_meter
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
electricity_model = #{record.electricityModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electricity_name = #{record.electricityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electric_standards = #{record.electricStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voltage_test = #{record.voltageTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
active_energy = #{record.activeEnergy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Installation_mode = #{record.installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
community_mode = #{record.communityMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
measure_mode = #{record.measureMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power_factor = #{record.powerFactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power_waste = #{record.powerWaste,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mem = #{record.mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update nnlightctl_electricity_meter set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, electricity_model = #{record.electricityModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electricity_name = #{record.electricityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electric_standards = #{record.electricStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voltage_test = #{record.voltageTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active_energy = #{record.activeEnergy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Installation_mode = #{record.installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_mode = #{record.communityMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, measure_mode = #{record.measureMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power_factor = #{record.powerFactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power_waste = #{record.powerWaste,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem = #{record.mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update nnlightctl_electricity_meter
electricity_model = #{electricityModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electricity_name = #{electricityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
electric_standards = #{electricStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voltage_test = #{voltageTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
active_energy = #{activeEnergy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Installation_mode = #{installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
community_mode = #{communityMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
measure_mode = #{measureMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power_factor = #{powerFactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power_waste = #{powerWaste,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mem = #{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update nnlightctl_electricity_meter set electricity_model = #{electricityModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electricity_name = #{electricityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electric_standards = #{electricStandards,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, voltage_test = #{voltageTest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active_energy = #{activeEnergy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Installation_mode = #{installationMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, community_mode = #{communityMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, measure_mode = #{measureMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power_factor = #{powerFactor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power_waste = #{powerWaste,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem = #{mem,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
